product_name: The North Face Campcam Rain Jacket - Toddler Boys'
long_description: When it's raining cats and dogs, The North Face Campcam Rain Jacket gives toddler boys waterproof, breathable protection. Polyester shell features HyVent 2-layer waterproof/breathable laminate and sealed seams for ironclad protection from precipitation. Mesh-lined body and brushed collar lining enhance breathability and comfort. The North Face Campcam Rain Jacket features a hood, chin guard, rip-and-stick storm flap, elasticized cuffs and ID label.
short_description: When it's raining cats and dogs, The North Face Campcam Rain Jacket gives toddler boys waterproof, breathable protection.
